skill.name: quality-manager-qms-iso13485
skill.description: ISO 13485 Quality Management System specialist for medical device companies. Provides QMS implementation, maintenance, process optimization, and compliance expertise. Use for QMS design, documentation control, management review, internal auditing, corrective actions, and ISO 13485 certification activities.

skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: Prompt-based skill with minimal code components. Contains a placeholder Python script with no network access or dangerous capabilities. All components serve legitimate QMS documentation and compliance purposes.

content.value_statement: Medical device companies need robust quality management systems to meet regulatory requirements and maintain certification. This skill provides expert guidance for QMS implementation, documentation control, internal audits, and ISO 13485 compliance activities.
actual_capabilities: Design and implement ISO 13485 compliant quality management systems
Create documentation control processes and templates
Prepare for management review meetings per ISO 13485 Clause 5.6
Plan and execute internal audit programs
Develop corrective and preventive action procedures
Align QMS with FDA 21 CFR 820 and MDR requirements
limitations: Does not provide legal or regulatory advice
Cannot replace formal ISO 13485 certification body audits
Does not execute code or access external systems
Skill output depends on user-provided context and documents

use_cases.title: Build QMS Documentation
use_cases.description: Create quality manuals, procedures, and work instructions aligned with ISO 13485 requirements.

use_cases.title: Prepare for Certification
use_cases.description: Organize documentation and evidence for ISO 13485 certification audits.

use_cases.title: Plan Audit Programs
use_cases.description: Develop risk-based audit schedules and checklist templates for internal quality audits.

prompt_templates.title: QMS Gap Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Conduct a gap analysis of our current quality practices against ISO 13485:2016 requirements. Identify the key gaps and provide a prioritized implementation roadmap.

prompt_templates.title: Document Control System
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a document control system for our medical device company including template standards, version control procedures, and approval workflows per ISO 13485 Clause 4.2.3.

prompt_templates.title: Management Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Prepare a comprehensive management review input report covering all ISO 13485 Clause 5.6.2 requirements including audit results, customer feedback, and corrective action status.

prompt_templates.title: CAPA Process
prompt_templates.prompt: Develop a corrective and preventive action procedure that includes root cause analysis, effectiveness monitoring, and closure tracking per ISO 13485 requirements.

output_examples.input: Help us prepare for our first ISO 13485 certification audit
output: 1. Pre-Audit Preparation: Gather all required documentation including Quality Manual (Clause 4.2.2), documented procedures, and records of implementation.
2. Document Review: Verify all documents are controlled, current, and approved per your document control procedures.
3. Internal Audit: Conduct a mock audit using ISO 13485 clauses as criteria. Document all findings and corrective actions.
4. Management Review: Schedule and document a management review meeting covering all Clause 5.6.2 inputs.
5. Evidence Organization: Prepare organized evidence folders for each ISO 13485 clause demonstrating implementation and effectiveness.
6. Nonconformity Preparation: Review previous audit findings and verify all CAPAs are closed and effective.

best_practices: Start with a comprehensive gap analysis before implementing QMS elements to prioritize efforts effectively.
Maintain clear linkage between quality policy, objectives, and documented procedures throughout the QMS.
Document evidence of QMS effectiveness through metrics, audits, and management review records.
anti_patterns: Copying templates without adapting them to your actual processes and organizational context.
Treating ISO 13485 compliance as a one-time project rather than an ongoing quality system.
Focusing on documentation completion over actual process implementation and effectiveness.

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with FDA 21 CFR 820?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill covers QMS elements that align with FDA Quality System Regulation requirements.

faq.question: What is the difference between ISO 13485 and ISO 9001?
faq.answer: ISO 13485 is specifically for medical devices with stronger regulatory focus and documentation requirements.

faq.question: Can this skill replace a quality consultant?
faq.answer: No. The skill provides guidance but complex implementations should involve qualified quality professionals.

faq.question: Does the skill store any sensitive data?
faq.answer: No. The skill is prompt-based and does not store or transmit any user data.

faq.question: How long does ISO 13485 certification take?
faq.answer: Timelines vary based on organization size and current quality maturity, typically 6-18 months.

faq.question: What tools integrate with this skill?
faq.answer: The skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for QMS guidance and documentation generation.
